Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=4.69 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacterium:Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1 (MIC=4.7 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Peptidomics and genomics analysis of novel antimicrobial peptides from the frog, Rana nigrovittata.
Literature.Author: Ma Y, Liu C, Liu X, Wu J, Yang H, Wang Y, Li J, Yu H, Lai R.
